title: Expert Course on Educational System Design Using UML Stereotypes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and managerial work experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining a smartphone-based learning platform with monthly offline workshops, focusing on strengthening corporate scientific education system design capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can visualize teaching-learning mechanisms of educational systems using UML stereotypes.
Learners can design learning model creation/monitoring/re-adaptation processes as UML diagrams.
Learners can design a science education system document suitable for corporate environments through team-based projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
